column2: "Hom mbɔ akasamu no mu wɔ Zion
column3: na hom mbɔ ehuu wɔ me bepɔw krɔnkrɔn no do; hom mma asaase no do atsefo nyina ho mpopo: osiandɛ EWURADZE da no rudu

column2: "sum na kusuww da
column4: dɛ ahanamakye a ayerɛw mbepɔw do; ɔman bi a ɔso na no ho yɛ dzen a ne saso mmbaa da a
column6: dze ekesi mbasantsen pii mfe do mpo."

column2: "Ogya hyew dzi hɔn enyim; ogyaframee dzɛw dzi hɔn ekyir: hɔn enyim asaase tse dɛ Eden ture
"Hɔn hwɛbea tse dɛ mpɔnkɔ hɔn hwɛbea; na wotu mbirika dɛ mpɔnkɔdofo."
"Wohuruhuruw dɛ ntseaseanam kyirdidi wɔ mbepɔw do
column3: dɛ gyaframee a ɔrehyew mburonan hurududuudu
column4: dɛ dɔm a hɔn ho yɛ dzen a wɔatoto hɔn wɔ akono."

column2: "Aman ho guan hɔn wɔ hɔn enyim: na enyim nyina atotow."
"Wotu mbirika dɛ mbarimba akatakyi; wɔfow afasu dɛ akombarimba; na wɔtsen fa hɔn akwan do
"Eso ɔbaako nnsun ne nyɛnko; hɔn nyina nenam hɔn mpasuar do: wɔbɔ hwira akodze mu a
"Wɔyɛ kurow no mu menyamenya; wotutu afasu do mbirika; wɔfow kɔ efi mu; wɔnam ntokura mu hɛn mu dɛ owifo."
"Asaase wosow wɔ hɔn enyim; ɔsor hihim: ewia na bosoom hyɛ sum
column3: na nworaba yi hɔn hyerɛn fi hɔ:"

column2: "na EWURADZE ma ne ndze do wɔ no dɔm enyim; na ne nseraban so dɛ; na nyia odzi n'asɛm ekyir no no ho yɛ dzen: na EWURADZE da no so na ɔyɛ hu dɛ; na woana botum enyim gyina?"
"Naaso seseiara mpo
column7: na ewuotwa nsan mbra me nkyɛn:"

column2: "na hom nsunsuan hom akoma mu
column4: na hom ndan mbra EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn nkyɛn: na ɔyɛ ɔdomfo
column8: na ɔsakyer n'adwen wɔ mbusu ho."

column2: "Woana nyim dɛ ɔrennsan nnsakyer n'adwen
column3: na onngya nhyira wɔ n'ekyir a
column4: ɔyɛ edziban afɔr na ɔnom afɔr a wɔdze bɛma EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn?"

column2: "Hom mbɔ akasamu no mu wɔ Zion
"hom mboa ɔman no ano
column6: na enumfoanomba: hom mma ayeforkun mfi ne pia mu mpue

column2: "Hom mma asɔfo no
column4: nsu wɔ nkrandaa na afɔrmbukyia no ntamu
column8: na mma mmfa w'egyapadze mma ahorohoraa
column9: amma amanaman eenndzi hɔn do tum. Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na wɔka no aman mu dɛ

column2: "Nna afei EWURADZE twee n'asaase ho nyinkun
"Na EWURADZE buae see ne man dɛ
column7: na mama hom amee: na merennhyɛ hom ahorohoraa wɔ amanaman mu bio."

column2: "Na mibeyi kwaamu afamu dɔm no efi hom nkyɛn akɔ
column3: na meetwuw hɔn adze akɔ asaase kwawee na amamfo do
column4: na hɔn twafo dɔm no akɔ boka afamu po no mu
column5: na hɔn nkyidɔm akɔ anee afamu po no ho; na hɔn bɔnee bɛyɛ kɛse
column6: na hɔn nyaanyan so akɔ sor

column2: "Asaase e
column4: w'enyi ngye na dzi ehurusi; osiandɛ EWURADZE ayɛ ndzɛmba akɛse."

column2: "Hambowa
column3: mma hom akoma nntu; na sar do mfunoma refefɛw
column5: adɔmbadua na wenyindua riyi hɔn ahoɔdzen ma."

column2: "Zionmba
column4: na hom ndzi ehurusi wɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn mu: na ɔrema hom esusow nsu wɔ tsenenee mu
column5: na ɔrema nsu atɔ ama hom
column7: wɔ bosoom a odzi kan no mu."

column2: "Na ewifua bɛhyɛ poroweebea amaama
column3: na nsa na ngo bɛyɛ nkorbaa amaama ebu do."

column2: "Na mebɛhyɛ hom mfe a mbɛbɛw
column6: mo dɔm a mosomaa hɔn baa hom do no dzii no

column2: "Na hom bedzidzi bafuu na hom amee
column3: na hom eyi EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn a ɔnye hom edzi no nwanwa mu no ne dzin ayɛw: na me man n'enyim runngu ase dabiarada."

column2: "Na hom bohu dɛ mowɔ Israel finimfin
column3: na dɛ emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn
column4: na obi nnyi hɔ bio: na me man enyim runngu ase dabiarada."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ n'ekyir no
column3: mubohue mo sunsum egu adasa nyina do; na hom mbabanyin na hom mbabaa bɛhyɛ nkɔm

column2: "na eso hom nkowaa na hom mfonabaa do na mubohue mo sunsum egu wɔ nda no mu."
"Na mebɛkyerɛ anwanwadze wɔ sor na asaase
"Ewia bɛdan sum
column3: na bosoom adan bɔgya ansaana EWURADZE ne da kɛse a ɔyɛ hu no aba."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ obiara a ɔbɔbɔ EWURADZE ne dzin no
column3: wɔbɛgye no nkwa: na Zion bepɔw do na Jerusalɛm na dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE aka no
column4: hɔn a wobefi nsa nye hɔn a EWURADZE refrɛ hɔn wɔ hɔn a wɔaka no mu no bɛtsena."
